variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: gzip
dependencies.description:
GNU Gzip is a popular data compression program originally written by
Jean-loup Gailly for the GNU project.

dependencies.name: ncurses
dependencies.description:
The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports
pads and color and multiple highlights and forms characters and
function-key mapping, and has all the other SYSV-curses enhancements
over BSD curses.

dependencies.name: pcre
dependencies.description:
The PCRE package contains Perl Compatible Regular Expression libraries.
These are useful for implementing regular expression pattern matching
using the same syntax and semantics as Perl 5.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: libxpm
dependencies.description: libXpm - X Pixmap (XPM) image file format library.

dependencies.name: giflib
dependencies.description:
The GIFLIB project maintains the giflib service library, which has been
pulling images out of GIFs since 1989.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxaw
dependencies.description:
Xaw is the X Athena Widget Set. Xaw is a widget set based on the X
Toolkit Intrinsics (Xt) Library.

dependencies.name: gtkplus
dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.

dependencies.name: gnutls
dependencies.description:
GnuTLS is a secure communications library implementing the SSL, TLS and
DTLS protocols and technologies around them. It provides a simple C
language application programming interface (API) to access the secure
communications protocols as well as APIs to parse and write X.509, PKCS
#12, OpenPGP and other required structures. It is aimed to be portable
and efficient with focus on security and interoperability.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg-turbo is a fork of the original IJG libjpeg which uses SIMD to
accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression. libjpeg is a
library that implements JPEG image encoding, decoding and transcoding.

dependencies.name: tree-sitter
dependencies.description:
Tree-sitter is a parser generator tool and an incremental parsing
library. It can build a concrete syntax tree for a source file and
efficiently update the syntax tree as the source file is edited.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: texinfo
dependencies.description:
Texinfo is the official documentation format of the GNU project. It was
invented by Richard Stallman and Bob Chassell many years ago, loosely
based on Brian Reid's Scribe and other formatting languages of the time.
It is used by many non-GNU projects as well.

dependencies.name: gcc
dependencies.description:
The GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Objective-C,
Fortran, Ada, and Go, as well as libraries for these languages.

dependencies.name: jansson
dependencies.description:
Jansson is a C library for encoding, decoding and manipulating JSON
data.

dependent_to.name: perl-fth
dependent_to.description:
Ftagshtml is a Fortran (and simple C) to HTML browsing, resolves static
interface overload. It can handle some LaTeX comments inside the source
files. It only needs to be put somewhere into your disk since it uses
Perl. It also provides javatex2.pl initmak.pl getin.pl tex3ht.pl and
view.pl: (1) javatex2 complements latex2html to make nice browsing, (2)
initmak makes fortran 90 dependencies, either full deps or partial (when
interface is not modified it is silly to recompile everything) (3) getin
is an advanced search tool for Fortran variables and calls, (4) view.pl
is used for CGI search when source is on http server.

dependent_to.name: pinentry
dependent_to.description:
pinentry is a small collection of dialog programs that allow GnuPG to
read passphrases and PIN numbers in a secure manner. There are versions
for the common GTK and Qt toolkits as well as for the text terminal
(Curses).

dependent_to.name: cask
dependent_to.description:
Cask is a project management tool for Emacs Lisp to automate the package
development cycle; development, dependencies, testing, building,
packaging and more.
